props.description: Studying and honing his skills across the spectrum of technical affluency and product development - he's worked as a Product Manager, a UX Designer as well as a system administrator.  He also rarely speaks in third person (promise).

data.title: Designer
data.description: Studying a 400 hour hands-on UX immersive course, I learnt the design process & provided UX consulting for a NfP. I learnt how to research, and analyse insights to inform prototypes - from wireframes to high fidelity designs.

data.title: Developer
data.description: After another 400 hours of learning and applying coding skills, across both front and back-end, I've learned how to apply my other skills and actually build products. It's in development that I've found my real passion.

data.title: Deliverer
data.description: Three years working as a Product Manager, building a new team from the ground up & delivering an Android app. I've learned how to work in a high-performing Product team and deliver great products.

data.title: Debugger
data.description: Ten years working in Sysadmin & IT Consulting gave me a deep knowledge of technology and sharp problem solving skills. These have helped me quickly adopt development practices with a focus on high-quality code.
